item.title: [afc] Fertile Ground
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant land

Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

item.title: [afc] Kenrith's Transformation
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Kenrith's Transformation enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)

item.title: [afc] Greater Good
item.description:
Enchantment

Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

item.title: [afc] Garruk's Uprising
item.description:
Enchantment

When Garruk's Uprising enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.

Creatures you control have trample. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.)

Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

item.title: [afc] Paradise Druid
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Paradise Druid has hexproof as long as it's untapped.(It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [afc] Kindred Summons
item.description:
Instant

Choose a creature type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards of the chosen type, where X is the number of creatures you control of that type. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

item.title: [afc] Rishkar's Expertise
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.

You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [afc] Return to Nature
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Exile target card from a graveyard.

item.title: [afc] Return of the Wildspeaker
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Draw cards equal to the greatest power among non-Human creatures you control.

• Non-Human creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.title: [afc] Rancor
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.

When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

item.title: [afc] Rampant Growth
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [afc] Wild Growth
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant land

Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

item.title: [afc] Verdant Embrace
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token."

item.title: [afc] Utopia Sprawl
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant Forest

As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color.

Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

item.title: [afc] Shamanic Revelation
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw a card for each creature you control.

Ferocious — You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

item.title: [afc] Ashen Rider
item.description:
Creature — Archon

Flying

When Ashen Rider enters the battlefield or dies, exile target permanent.

item.title: [afc] Bituminous Blast
item.description:
Instant

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

item.title: [afc] Behemoth Sledge
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.

Equip {3}

item.title: [afc] Bedevil
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.

item.title: [afc] Bant Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Put target creature on the bottom of its owner's library.

• Counter target instant spell.

item.title: [afc] Baleful Strix
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Bird

Flying, deathtouch

When Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [afc] Atarka, World Render
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon

Flying, trample

Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [afc] Fleecemane Lion
item.description:
Creature — Cat

{3}{G}{W}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)

As long as Fleecemane Lion is monstrous, it has hexproof and indestructible.

item.title: [afc] Despark
item.description:
Instant

Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.

item.title: [afc] Cold-Eyed Selkie
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Rogue

Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

Whenever Cold-Eyed Selkie deals combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards.

item.title: [afc] Cloudblazer
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

Flying

When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

item.title: [afc] Savage Ventmaw
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Savage Ventmaw attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

item.title: [afc] Rakdos Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

• Destroy target artifact.

• Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller.

item.title: [afc] Obsessive Stitcher
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

{2}{U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Obsessive Stitcher: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [afc] Necrotic Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "{3}, Sacrifice this permanent: Destroy target permanent."

item.title: [afc] Knight of Autumn
item.description:
Creature — Dryad Knight

When Knight of Autumn enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Put two +1/+1 counters on Knight of Autumn.

• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

• You gain 4 life.

item.title: [afc] Hostage Taker
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Hostage Taker enters the battlefield, exile another target creature or artifact until Hostage Taker leaves the battlefield. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

item.title: [afc] Vanish into Memory
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

item.title: [afc] Utter End
item.description:
Instant

Exile target nonland permanent.

item.title: [afc] Theater of Horrors
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library.

During your turn, if an opponent lost life this turn, you may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled with Theater of Horrors.

{3}{R}: Theater of Horrors deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

item.title: [afc] Terminate
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.title: [afc] Shielding Plax
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

({G/U} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.)

Enchant creature

When Shielding Plax enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

item.title: [afc] Chaos Wand
item.description:
Artifact

{4}, {T}: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of that library in a random order.

item.title: [afc] Burnished Hart
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Elk

{3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [afc] Basilisk Collar
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.

Equip {2}

item.title: [afc] Argentum Armor
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +6/+6.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, destroy target permanent.

Equip {6}

item.title: [afc] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [afc] Fellwar Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [afc] Explorer's Scope
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [afc] Dragon's Hoard
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.

{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [afc] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [afc] Colossus Hammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +10/+10 and loses flying.

Equip {8} ({8}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [afc] Mind Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

item.title: [afc] Meteor Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

item.title: [afc] Masterwork of Ingenuity
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

You may have Masterwork of Ingenuity enter the battlefield as a copy of any Equipment on the battlefield.
